DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine whether Low Level Laser Therapy ( LLLT ) reduce pain and/or improve wound heal patient acute traumatic injury upper extremity ( wrist , forearm , elbow ) .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Of Infrared Photobiotherapy Improved Wound Healing
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , two group , control study use random assignment . All eligible patient randomly assign one two group : control group ( usual care ) experimental group ( usual care plus LLLT ) . We plan enroll 50 subject study : 25 subject randomly assign LLLT group 25 usual care group . All subject recruit within one two day prior hospital discharge time first postoperative clinic visit . No subject recruit sedate receive intravenous pain medication .
